nodes.text: Garel City was a city on the Outer Rim planet Garel. It was the location of the Garel City Spaceport. The Leonis and Spanjaf families lived there under false identities after the rescue of Dhara Leonis from Project Harvester. The city became a refuge and temporary base for the rebel cell Phoenix Cell after they were driven away from Lothal. The city sustained damage when Phoenix Squadron was forced to flee the planet after the Empire learned of the rebels' presence there.
